OOC: It's Meteara, not Meteeara

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "dewboy30816" <dewboy30816@y...> wrote:
> OOC: I'm going to burn some posts.
> 
> BIC:  An asteroid field appears around Owlhawk.
> 
> Owlhawk (in Sunhawk's voice):  WHAT IN THE PIT!
> 
> Onboard Computer (Snowowl):  Hawk this is a test.  The Sarga want to 
> see if we deserve the power they've given use.
> 
> Owlhawk:  WHAT DO THEY THINK I AM, A TRANSMETAL!
> 
> OC:  Uhhhh.....Hawk look again.
> 
> As he dodges an asteroid Owlhawk looks at himself and notices HE IS 
A 
> TRANSMETAL!
> 
> OC:  Now listen Hawk.  Our first target for the Sarga will be a Vok 
> emmisary named Meteera, but they figured we'd also want to work on 
> taking out Megatron, so we've basically been designed as his 
> executioner.  You'll find we're more than a match for him strength 
> wise, we can follow every move he makes with speed, we at least as 
> much fire power, and we're more capable of standing up to high 
> temperatures such as his fire breath than other bots even other 
> Transmetals, although nobot can take a direct hit from that and be 
> TOTALLY unscathed, not even us.  Now take out the asteroids.
> 
> He fires a mini plasma canon on his wrist at a nearby asteroid 
> blowing it to bits, then his lower wings transform into automatic 
> rifles and blast most of the rubble.
> 
> OOC:  I'm trying to keep posting while I wait for the Vok Destroyer 
> decesion if it ever comes.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "dewboy30816" <dewboy30816@y...> wrote:
> > OOC: I'm still waiting on the Vok Destroyer decision.
> > 
> > BIC:  The sparks continue circling closer until they connect and 
> fuse 
> > into one.  Then a solid body forms around them.  Taller than 
either 
> > of there old ones it looks like an angel with 3 sets of wings, a 
> top 
> > one being hawks, a middle one being owls, and a lower one being 
> > entirely cybernetic.
